body:
(I am not sure if this specifies under Avicus lounge or not)

This is a question to all admins, and mods... WHY am i banned? i only played 1 game and started another! and without any warning at all i was banned for kill aura and want to know why? i have been playing on avicus for a long long time and have not been banned or anything and rarely got called a hacker and when i did i never got banned or anything and this time without any notice just me playing on senex 2 i get banned and i don't know why people would think i would hack when there was and admin and like 3 mods!! so i just want to know why i was banned?

title: What the heck?!?!
